mapper.sql: id, proname, prosn, proprice, pronum, proimg, profullname, unit, createdate, status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from product
order by ${orderByClause}

distinct

mapper.insert: insert into product (id, proname, prosn, proprice, pronum, proimg, profullname, unit, createdate, status, desc) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prosn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pronum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into product

proname,
prosn,
proprice,
pronum,
proimg,
profullname,

createdate,
status,
desc,

mapper.update:
update product
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proname = #{record.proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prosn = #{record.prosn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proprice = #{record.proprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pronum = #{record.pronum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proimg = #{record.proimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profullname = #{record.profullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdate = #{record.createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desc = #{record.desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update product
proname = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prosn = #{prosn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proprice = #{proprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pronum = #{pronum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proimg = #{proimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profullname = #{profullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
